NAME: Kenan Günes
ABOUT_ME_DESC1: Hi, I am a German-speaking Junior Frontend Developer with a passion for technology and innovation. My mission is to create engaging and functional web applications. User-friendliness and clean code are my top priorities. I look forward to working on exciting projects in a motivated team.
ABOUT_ME_DESC2: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Mayen and remotely.
ABOUT_ME_DESC3: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT_ME_DESC4: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
SKILLS_INTRO: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS_CONTACT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
PROJECTS_INTRO: Here you can test my projects live and get an impression of my work.
PROJECT1_DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions.
PROJECT2_DESCRIPTION: 2D platformer game built with vanilla JavaScript. Play as a chicken avoiding enemies and collecting items.
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT_TALK: Need a Frontend developer? Let's talk

FORM_PRIVACY_ERROR: You must agree to the privacy policy.
PRIVACY_GENERAL_DESC: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data includes all data that can be used to personally identify you. Detailed information on the subject of data protection can be found in our privacy policy below.
PRIVACY_RESPONSIBILITY: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
PRIVACY_RESPONSIBILITY_DESC: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. Their contact details can be found in the section 'Notice regarding the responsible party' in this privacy policy.
PRIVACY_HOW_WE_COLLECT: How do we collect your data?
PRIVACY_HOW_WE_COLLECT_DESC_1: Your data is collected when you provide it to us. For example, this could be data that you enter into a contact form.
PRIVACY_HOW_WE_COLLECT_DESC_2: Other data is automatically collected or collected with your consent when you visit the website. This includes technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page access). This data is collected automatically as soon as you visit this website.
PRIVACY_USAGE: What do we use your data for?
PRIVACY_USAGE_DESC: Part of the data is collected to ensure error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze user behavior.
PRIVACY_RIGHTS: What rights do you have regarding your data?
PRIVACY_RIGHTS_DESC: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time free of charge. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. For more details, please refer to the full privacy policy.
